title: "Journal Entry 01"
output: html_document
date: "2026-01-09"
---
```{r}
# 1. Create a 5x10 matrix of random integers
set.seed(67) 

matrix <- matrix(sample(1:100, 50, replace = TRUE), nrow = 5, ncol = 10)

# 2. Change column names
colnames(matrix) <- c("cond1", "cond2", "cond3", "cond4", "cond5", "ctrl1", "ctrl2", "ctrl3", "ctrl4", "ctrl5")

# 3. Change row names
rownames(matrix) <- c("gene1", "gene2","gene3","gene4","gene5")

# 4. Get means of control and conditions 
cond <- rowMeans(matrix[, 1:5])
ctrl <- rowMeans(matrix[, 6:10])

# 5. Get fold change 
fold_change <- cond/ctrl

# 6. Stitch it all together 
results <- cbind(matrix, fold_change)

print(results)
```
